scenes.description: IRyS performs a cover of 'One Last Kiss' by Hikaru Utada.
Closing MC section where IRyS thanks the audience for attending her 3D showcase.

subtitles.original: Can you give me one last kiss?
subtitles.english: Can you give me one last kiss?

subtitles.english: Things I don't want to forget
